headline: Can Anaergia’s (TSX:ANRG) PepsiCo Biomethane Deal Redefine Its Waste-to-Energy Investment Narrative?
summary: Anaergia Inc., through its subsidiary Anaergia Technologies, LLC, previously signed a contract with PepsiCo Mexico Foods unit Sabritas S. de R.L. de C.V. to supply high-efficiency digestion, biogas conditioning, and upgrading systems that will convert about 50,000 tons of organic residuals per year into carbon-negative biomethane at a Mexican food production facility. The project, expected to be operating before the end of 2026, highlights how Anaergia’s waste-to-energy technology can...
